title: High Debt Service Ratio
description: In 2023, Pakistan's debt service as a percentage of exports of goods, services, and primary income reached 37.01%, indicating a significant financial burden. This is one of the highest ratios globally.

title: Limited Use of Insecticide-Treated Bed Nets
description: As of 2018, only 0.4% of Pakistan's under-5 population used insecticide-treated bed nets, highlighting a critical gap in malaria prevention efforts.

title: High Diabetes Prevalence
description: In 2021, 30.8% of Pakistan's population aged 20 to 79 was affected by diabetes, marking one of the highest prevalence rates worldwide.

title: Declining Import Unit Value Index
description: The import unit value index for Pakistan was 67.1 in 2023, reflecting a decrease from the base year 2015, indicating a reduction in import costs.

title: Negative Net Financial Flows
description: In 2023, Pakistan experienced a net financial outflow of $301.23 million in RDB concessional funds, suggesting a reliance on external financial support.

title: Strained Public Debt Service
description: Public and publicly guaranteed debt service accounted for 31.99% of exports in 2023, indicating a significant financial strain on the country's economy.

title: Challenges in Business Insolvency Infrastructure
description: In 2024, Pakistan's score for the quality of institutional and operational infrastructure for judicial insolvency proceedings was 3.33, indicating room for improvement.
